definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Our parochial narrowness and cultural hubris are a dangerous combination.
sentences.chinese: 我們本位主義的狹隘性和傲慢文化是一個危險的結合。
本位主義是放大了的個人主義。

sentences.english: What is it with the egotistical nationalist comments?
sentences.chinese: 這是民族本位主義評論麼？
